  • conda-env commands »
  • conda env export
  • Edit on GitHub

conda env exportÂ¶


CONDA(1)                         User Commands                        CONDA(1)



NAME
       conda - conda env export

DESCRIPTION
       usage: conda-env export [-h] [-n NAME] [-f FILE]

       Export a given environment

   optional arguments:
       -h, --help
              show this help message and exit

       -n NAME, --name NAME
              name of environment (in envs dirs)

       -f FILE, --file FILE

   examples:
              conda env export conda env export --file SOME_FILE



Continuum Analytics                June 2015                          CONDA(1)
